contract_type.explanation: The document is titled 'TWENTY-FIRST AMENDMENT TO FIRST LIEN ISDA 2002 MASTER AGREEMENT,' explicitly identifying it as an ISDA Master Agreement amendment.

contract_type_version.explanation: The title and body repeatedly reference the 'ISDA 2002 Master Agreement.'

contract_date.explanation: The recitals state the original First Lien ISDA 2002 Master Agreement was dated as of March 17, 2016, which is the main contract date for this amendment.

amendment_date.explanation: The amendment is stated to be 'entered into as of March 25, 2022' in the introductory paragraph.

amendment_number.explanation: The document is titled 'TWENTY-FIRST AMENDMENT,' indicating this is the 21st amendment.

version_type.explanation: The document is an amendment, as stated in the title and introductory paragraph.

status.explanation: The document is labeled 'Execution Version,' which typically indicates an executed agreement.

party_name_1.explanation: The introductory paragraph identifies 'MERRILL LYNCH COMMODITIES, INC.' as a party.

party_role_1.explanation: 'MERRILL LYNCH COMMODITIES, INC.' is explicitly defined as 'Party A' in the introductory paragraph.

party_name_2.explanation: The introductory paragraph identifies 'U.S. OIL & REFINING CO.' as a party.
